episode.title: Way of the Future
episode.rawTitle: 166: ‘Way of the Future’ With Rene Ritchie
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Rene Ritchie returns to the show to discuss what we expect to see at Apple’s upcoming event in San Francisco: new iPhones (without headphone jacks, and with a radical new two-lens camera on the Plus-sized model), Apple Watch 2 (and a new fall lineup of watch bands). We also discuss Samsung’s recall of the Galaxy Note 7 (because of exploding batteries), when we’ll see new Mac hardware and new iPads, and more.
